lead_paragraph: Carolina Panthers All-Pro linebacker Thomas Davis should be ready to play in Super Bowl 50 despite breaking his arm in Sunday's NFC championship game, head coach Ron Rivera said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Panthers' Davis Vows to Play in Super Bowl Despite Broken Arm
headline.main: Panthers' Davis Vows to Play in Super Bowl Despite Broken Arm

snippet: Carolina Panthers All-Pro linebacker Thomas Davis should be ready to play in Super Bowl 50 despite breaking his arm in Sunday's NFC championship game, head coach Ron Rivera said on Monday....
